name: This Side Up (itch) (ChipChase)
description:
Your goal is to keep the box away from the ground using your mouse!

Easy Mode - Adds walls to the sides of the map

Normal Mode - The normal difficultly, no walls on the side of the screen

Made for the BenBonk game jam 4. Made using only 4 colors.  The music is made a by an AI called Mubert.
